column4: hi. a have lubuntu 10.10. i have problem with video not showing, only audio works. this just started happening, after i tried to "repair"  an incomplete file with VLC. now nothing wokrs and all videos only have audio and a black screen. i tried reboot,check diff video files,and use other players. same problem. can anyone help?streaming vids from websites like youtube still works
Have you tried marking VLC for re-installation?
you mean uninstall and reinstall vlc?
no, but i didnt think that would help since i tried movie player and gnome mplayer and its the same problem
WHat is in place of no video? blue screen? Black screen?
I wonder if the "xv" output (xvideo) is working...
idk about that. how do i check?
I'm too use to using "mplayer" the command line..
that worked! do you know what the problem is now and what i should do to fix this?
Your xvideo extension seems to be broken, unfortunately I don't know how to fix that at the moment.
Are you on an ATI graphic card?
damn. no, its nvidia. its an old acer laptop
Did you recently do anything with cairo-dock?
i dont think so because i dont know what that is...
Not sure what is causing xvideo to not work with the nvidia driver at the moment.. please try another person.
